post:
Hey Guys,

before anyone gonna butthurt me, i asked mpkpossen for permission to post that.

We have still some resources free on our Hetzner i7, which is used mainly for Gameservers for our Community with over 250 active Members.
The Gameservers are hosted with Easy-WI, it has many features as active monitoring your gameservers and reboot it automatically when it crash, doing backups from your gameservers, using up to 3 templates for maps/addons/cfg and ususally basic stuff like restart/stop and watch the console log.

All Gameservers are Hosted atm on that box:

CPU: Intel Core i7-2600<br>
Memory: 32GB DDR3<br>
HDD: 2x 3TB Enterprise Disks (SW Raid 1)<br>
Connection: 1Gbit<br>
Location: Germany, Nürnberg<br>
Running with Debian Wheezy<br>

We Support the following Games:

- Minecraft Server with 2GB by default for Vanilla/Spignot/Tekkit/TekkitClassic
- Counter-Strike: Source
- Counter-Strike Global Offensive
- Counter-Strike 1.6
- Counter-Strike: Condition Zero
- Garrysmod (Linux)
- Team Fotress Classic
- Team Fotress 2
- NoMoreRoomInHell
- Left 4 Dead
- Left 4 Dead 2
- Age Of Chivalry
- Insurgency
- Synergy

When you Game is not listed, you can drop me a PN and ask for it.

If you are interested to get one of these Gameservers, drop a PN with:

- The Game and the Slots
- Why you want one
- What you want to do with it (at least 4 sentences)
- E-Mail adress to send your the details

Infinity580
